beer.beer_description:
First time experimenting with the highly versatile Krush hops and it truly is a fruit cocktail in a can.

With bursts of orange citrus, tropical mango, guava and peach, this Misty Pale Ale is full of complex characters that deliver deliciously ripe flavours and fruit forward aromas.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 270 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 55!

beer.beer_description:
First time experimenting with the highly versatile Krush hops and it truly is a fruit cocktail in a can.

With bursts of orange citrus, tropical mango, guava and peach, this Misty Pale Ale is full of complex characters that deliver deliciously ripe flavours and fruit forward aromas.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 350 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 71.

beer.beer_description:

items.badge_description:
The beer style with the most annual check-ins definitely deserves its own party, don’t you think?

In 2023, Sierra Nevada had the brilliant idea to create a day of celebration for hazies, and we gotta tip our cap to their brilliant idea! 

This year, we’re excited to introduce our second iteration of the Hazy IPA Day badge.

items.checkin_comment: Really enjoying this one a lot.

user.bio: I enjoy drinking a new beer every day. Quality over quantity. I also enjoy travelling and drinking beer.

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 30 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 7. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 60 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 13!
